messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] movies (was Seeing While You Read)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/14/02 11:53:59 AM Central Daylight Time, ... I liked that movie better than the book too.  I also liked the Mary Poppins and Chitty Chitty
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/14/02 11:53:59 AM Central Daylight Time,
Hatfield72@... writes:


> The only movie to me that has been better than the book was Wizard of
> Oz.
>

I liked that movie better than the book too. I also liked the Mary Poppins
and Chitty Chitty Bang Bang movies better than the books.

~Ellen

"It is, in fact, nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of
instruction have not yet entirely strangled the holy curiousity of inquiry;
for this delicate little plant, aside from stimulation, stands mainly in need
of freedom."
-- Albert Einstein
